translation.en: -[boy] Mom, Mom! That lady-- -[horn honks] [mother] She's fine. See? She's okay.
-[boy] She's going to the other side. -[mother] No, no. God!
Don't! Oh--
-Don't look! -[boy whispers] She let go.
[Alice] Blink twice if you can hear me.
translation.es: Pestañea dos veces si me oyes.

translation.en: -How long have I been out? -Three days.
Did I flatline?
No, sweetheart. You're gonna be all right.
Are you sure? Did you read the ambulance record?
translation.es: ¿Está segura? ¿Leyó el informe de la ambulancia?

translation.en: I did not, but it's in your chart.
translation.es: No, pero está en tu historial.

translation.en: You have severe hypothermia and you're in shock.
translation.es: Sufriste hipotermia grave y estás en shock.

translation.en: If you didn't hit feet first,
translation.es: Si no hubieras caído con los pies,

translation.en: you would have smashed up your insides like hitting concrete.
translation.es: habrías aplastado tus órganos como si chocaras contra concreto.

translation.en: You got lucky.
What's your name?
Do you have family in the area? We need to contact them ASAP.
translation.es: ¿Tienes familia en la zona? Debemos contactarlos lo antes posible.

translation.en: -Do you want these-- -[gasps]
No, no, no, don't touch. No touching.
Okay. No touching.
Can you tell me... how you got those scars?
translation.es: ¿Puedes decirme cómo te hiciste esas cicatrices?

translation.en: [sighs, stammers] At least tell me your name.
Who are you?
I'm Alice, honey. I'm a nurse at St. Louis Hospital.
translation.es: Me llamo Alice, cariño. Soy enfermera del Hospital San Luis.

translation.en: What's your name?
I'm the OA.
-[cell phone ringing] -[Nancy] Really? That's funny.
-Uh, Ron... -[cell phone continues ringing]
My cell is ringing. Just... hold on a second.
translation.es: Me suena el celular. Un segundo.

translation.en: [softly] Eat before it gets cold.
translation.es: Come antes de que se enfríe.

translation.en: [Erica on cell phone] Hello? Hello?
Oh, uh, Erica, I'm just talking to my brother.
translation.es: Erica, estoy hablando con mi hermano.

translation.en: -Can I-- -Nancy, you gotta get on YouTube.
-Okay? Can you do that? -Yeah, of course I know YouTube.
translation.es: - ¿Puedes hacerlo? - Sí, claro que conozco YouTube.

translation.en: -[loud, indistinct TV chatter] -What...
translation.es: - Te envié un correo con el enlace. - ¿Qué...?

translation.en: Well, what makes you think that?
[Erica] Okay, I sent you an email with a link.
-Nance? -[keys clacking]
-[horns honking in video] -[Erica] You got it?
Abel!
-[boy] Mom, Mom! -[mother] She's fine.
-[Nancy] Abel! -[mother] She's okay.
-[boy] She's going to the other side. -[mother] Oh-- Don't look!
translation.es: Está pasándose al otro lado. ¡No mires!

translation.en: -As her legal guardian-- -Yeah, I understand. I understand.
I talked to the hospital lawyers. She simply isn't responding to the name you gave.
translation.es: Hablé con los abogados del hospital. No responde al nombre que dieron.

translation.en: -Well, we know what she looks like. -[scoffs]
I should warn you, she's in a very fractured mental state.
translation.es: Debo advertirles que está en un estado mental alterado.

translation.en: Agitated.
Kept trying to get to the computers in the ICU.
translation.es: Intentaba usar las computadoras en CI.

translation.en: If she is, in fact, who you think she is,
translation.es: Si es quien creen que es,

translation.en: you should know... she has very unusual scarring on her back.
translation.es: deberían saber... Tiene cicatrices extrañas en la espalda.

translation.en: The nurse said it's difficult to look at.
translation.es: Dice la enfermera que es duro verlas.

translation.en: She won't talk to anyone, including the police, about what happened.
translation.es: No habla con nadie de lo que pasó, ni siquiera con la policía.

translation.en: It's our professional opinion that she be committed to in-patient care.
[stammers] Excuse me. Excuse me. Can we just see our daughter, please?
translation.es: Disculpe. ¿Podemos ver a nuestra hija, por favor?

translation.en: Who are these people?
-[breath trembling] -Mom?
Prairie?
Prairie?
Prairie?
I don't understand.
She's our daughter, Prairie, but she's never seen us before.
translation.es: Es nuestra hija, Prairie, pero nunca nos había visto.

translation.en: Seven years ago, when she went missing...
she was blind.
-Is this it? -[Nancy] It is.
You're home.
All these cars...
I guess someone's having a party.
translation.es: Supongo que alguien está dando una fiesta.

translation.en: Oh, dear God.
How did they...
-[people clamoring] -[Abel] Well, let's get inside.
[Nancy] I should reverse. [Abel] You can't... You can't reverse now.
translation.es: - Debería retroceder. - No puedes retroceder ahora.

translation.en: Don't worry, sweetheart, they're-they're just happy...
translation.es: No te preocupes, cariño, solo están felices...

translation.en: -[Abel] Back up, please. Back off. -...that you're home safe.
translation.es: - Retrocedan. - de que estés a salvo.

translation.en: [Abel] Thank you.
Back out of the way.
[reporter] You might remember when Prairie Johnson disappeared
-seven years ago... -Give us some room, please.
[reporter] ...she was blind. Now reportedly she can see.
translation.es: ...era ciega. Ahora nos informan que puede ver.

translation.en: They're already calling her the Michigan Miracle. -Oh, here she is. Prairie! Prairie! -[clamoring]
translation.es: Lo llaman el Milagro de Michigan. Aquí está. ¡Prairie!

translation.en: We're so... we're so happy you're home. Let us see your face.
translation.es: Estamos muy felices de que estés en casa. Déjanos ver tu cara.

translation.en: Prairie, Prairie, is it... is it true you can see? Prairie, how did this happen?
translation.es: Prairie, ¿es cierto que puedes ver? ¿Cómo sucedió?

translation.en: [woman] Welcome home, Prairie!
That is not your name.
-Prairie is not your name. -[Abel] Back off. Thank you.
translation.es: - Prairie no es tu nombre. - Atrás.

translation.en: Over here, take a right. [reporter] We're so happy you're home safe.
translation.es: - Por aquí. A la derecha. - Nos alegra que estés sana en casa.

translation.en: -[Abel] Step coming up. Step. -[reporter] Let us see your eyes, Prairie.
translation.es: - Viene un escalón. - Déjanos ver tus ojos, Prairie.

translation.en: -Prairie, who took you? -Nancy?
-[breathing heavily] -[clamoring continues outside]
[reporter] Abel, do you think it was a miracle?
[Abel] Yes, it's true, our daughter can now see.
translation.es: Sí, es verdad, nuestra hija ahora puede ver.

translation.en: [Nancy] We found out yesterday.
translation.es: - No sabemos. Necesitamos detalles. - Nos enteramos ayer.

translation.en: -[Abel] Thank you! -[chuckles softly]
[Masters] I was on the task force that led the investigation when you went missing.
translation.es: Fui parte de la investigación cuando estabas desaparecida.

translation.en: I... am very, very glad to meet you.
Thank you.
So, we're just gonna ask you some questions
and you do the best you can, okay?
translation.es: y tú haz lo mejor que puedas, ¿sí?

translation.en: So, do you remember any of the events that led up to your disappearance?
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas alguno de los hechos que llevaron a tu desaparición?

translation.en: I remember everything.
Specifically, do you remember the night that you disappeared?
I didn't disappear.
I was present for all of it.
All seven years, three months, 11 days.
translation.es: Los siete años, tres meses y once días.

translation.en: [stuttering] Sorry-- [Masters] No, no, no, you're okay.
Maybe it would be better if we try to work this backwards.
translation.es: Quizás sería mejor si vamos retrocediendo.

translation.en: Let's start with the bridge.
Do you remember how you got there?
I walked, um, for a long time.
Maybe...
maybe days from...
I don't know where. Nowhere.
[stammers] Until I got to a road
translation.es: Hasta que llegué a un camino

translation.en: and I tried to get a ride.
And finally an old woman in a dusty car picked me up.
translation.es: Al final, una anciana en un auto polvoriento me recogió.

translation.en: What was her name? Where was this?
She-- She brought me to a place.
There were a lot of people there.
All-- All of them were lost.
A shelter?
Uh, I don't know.
Did you tell them who you were, or where you'd been,
translation.es: ¿Les dijiste quién eras, dónde habías estado

translation.en: or that you wanted to go home?
translation.es: o que querías volver a casa?

translation.en: I told them that I needed to leave, so they let me go.
translation.es: Les dije que debía irme, así que me dejaron ir.

translation.en: And I just kept walking.
[sighs] Trying to... get back.
Home?
To where you'd been held captive?
But I knew that they were gone.
translation.es: Pero sabía que se habían ido.

translation.en: The other captives?
When-- When you say gone, do you mean dead?
translation.es: Cuando dices que se habían ido, ¿quieres decir que habían muerto?

translation.en: Is that why you attempted to end your life at the bridge?
translation.es: ¿Por eso intentaste suicidarte en el puente?

translation.en: -That's not what I was doing. -[Hornby] But you jumped.
I was trying to get back to them to--
I was trying to get help in order--
You could've called the police from the shelter. They could've helped.
translation.es: Pudiste llamar a la policía desde el refugio. Habría ayudado.

translation.en: [stammering] That wouldn't-- That wouldn't have helped. Okay, we're just trying to follow.
translation.es: - No habría ayudado. - Bien, solo intentamos entenderte.

translation.en: So, they're not dead?
We all died more times than I can count.
translation.es: Todos morimos más veces de las que puedo contar.

translation.en: I think that's enough for now.
Your daughter's still immersed in her experience, which is normal.
translation.es: Su hija sigue inmersa en su experiencia, es normal.

translation.en: It's just best if we try again in a week or so.
translation.es: Es mejor si lo intentamos en una semana.

translation.en: [Hornby] If she were the perpetrator, we could push it.
[Masters] But you can't make a victim talk.
translation.es: No se puede obligar a hablar a una víctima.

translation.en: [automated voice] Welcome to OS Ten. -Voiceover is on. -[lowers volume]
translation.es: Bienvenido a OS Ten. VoiceOver activado.

translation.en: Launch Safari.
You are not connected to the Internet.
-[keys clacking] -[automated voice] Finder menu.
The selected AirPort network "Johnson" requires a password.
translation.es: La red inalámbrica seleccionada "Johnson" requiere contraseña.

translation.en: Password.
"Prairie" failure to authenticate.
[OA] Password, password. Where is it?
Where is it?
[Abel over tape] She's sleeping.
-She's been doing this for a couple of-- -[beeps]
translation.es: Lo hace desde hace un par de...

translation.en: Can't sleep either?
I bet...
I bet no one's around outside now.
translation.es: Apuesto a que no hay nadie afuera ahora.

translation.en: [Nancy stammering] I know that these things take time, and there's no rush...
translation.es: Sé que estas cosas toman tiempo, y no hay apuro...

translation.en: but I really need to know something.
How can you see?
[stammering] Can you tell me?
I can't.
Do you remember when they were building these?
It was gonna be the new Crestwood.
translation.es: Iba a ser el nuevo Crestwood.

translation.en: Then they ran out of money to finish.
translation.es: Se quedaron sin dinero antes de terminar.

translation.en: Always gives me a weird feeling.
translation.es: Siempre me da una sensación rara.

translation.en: How'd all this stuff get way back here?
[laughing] Wait, wait. Watch this.
Yo, it's her.
[Jesse] Shit, dude. I think that's Prairie Johnson.
translation.es: Mierda, creo que es Prairie Johnson.

translation.en: -I don't think I can cum again. -Oh.
translation.es: No creo que pueda acabar otra vez.

translation.en: I think I bit my lip.
translation.es: Creo que me mordí el labio.

translation.en: [sighs] You get blood on my dick? No, asshole.
translation.es: - ¿Dejaste sangre en mi pito? - No, idiota.

translation.en: You like that video Jesse made?
translation.es: ¿Te gusta el video que hizo Jesse?

translation.en: -Yeah, the stunts are cool. -[music stops]
You got skills.
Whoa! How did you guys film the blind girl?
-She's not blind anymore. -That's insane.
translation.es: - Ya no es ciega. - Es una locura.

translation.en: -Remember when she went missing? -[scoffs] Yeah.
We weren't allowed to go outside for, like, three years.
translation.es: No pudimos salir por tres años.

translation.en: Hey, don't go yet. It's early. Let's watch some stuff in bed.
translation.es: No te vayas todavía. Es temprano. Miremos algo en la cama.

translation.en: Steve, you have a really nice body
translation.es: Steve, tienes un cuerpo muy lindo

translation.en: and you smell good,
but this isn't a thing.
[Steve] It's chill.
There's someone else I'm into anyway, too.
translation.es: También hay alguien más que me gusta.

translation.en: Who are you into?
This guy in chorus. You wouldn't know him.
translation.es: Un chico del coro, no lo conoces.

translation.en: Chorus?
Aren't they all, like, gay?
Steve, I don't have to tell you shit and you don't have to tell me shit, okay?
translation.es: No tengo que decirte nada, tú a mí tampoco.

translation.en: Let's just let fucking be fucking.
Why is there a hole in my wall?
translation.es: ¿Por qué hay un agujero en mi pared?

translation.en: -Steve? -Yeah.
[sighs] That teacher, what was her name, Broderick-Allen?
She emailed.
She used the word "bully."
Sounds like you haven't been keeping your promises to me.
translation.es: Parece que no has cumplido lo que me prometiste.

translation.en: Fix it.
[OA] Do you remember the night we pretended we were in real beds
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas la noche que fingimos que estábamos en camas reales

translation.en: and we described them to each other? [chuckles lightly]
I'm in a real bed...
but I haven't slept a single night apart from you.
translation.es: pero no dormí ni una noche separada de ti.

translation.en: I'm scared, Homer.
There are moments when I think I made you up.
translation.es: Hay momentos en que creo que te inventé.

translation.en: That's why I need to see you.
To be sure you're real.
translation.es: Para estar segura de que eres real.

translation.en: I didn't leave you behind.
I would never.
I am coming for you.
[Nancy] Good morning, sweetheart. Good morning.
You said you'd get me the password for the Wi-Fi.
translation.es: Dijiste que me darías la contraseña del wifi.

translation.en: About that...
"Phone and Internet use should be monitored."
translation.es: "Controlar el uso del teléfono e Internet".

translation.en: It's-- It's for your own safety. It's from the hospital in St. Louis.
translation.es: Es por tu propia seguridad. Es del hospital de San Luis.

translation.en: Um, they go on with, "Doors should remain open at all times."
translation.es: Sigue con "Las puertas deben estar siempre abiertas".

translation.en: I think that's excessive.
Why don't we just go with not locking doors?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no solo dejamos las puertas sin llave?

translation.en: All right, honey?
[reporter on TV] Of those, more than 200,000 are abducted by family members.
translation.es: De esos, más de 200.000 son secuestrados por familiares.

translation.en: Only an estimated 115 are the victims
translation.es: Se calcula que solo 115 son víctimas

translation.en: of kidnapping cases like Elizabeth Smart's.
translation.es: de secuestros como el de Elizabeth Smart.

translation.en: Can this girl go back to being a normal human being,
translation.es: ¿Puede esta chica volver a ser un ser humano normal,

translation.en: or is there always a part of your experiences...
translation.es: o siempre hay una parte de sus experiencias que...?

translation.en: [OA] Hey. Hey...
Do you have Wi-Fi?
Uh... there's, uh, there's no electricity here.
But you live in the neighborhood. Could I get your password?
translation.es: Vives en el barrio. ¿Me das tu contraseña?

translation.en: Our Internet's down. It's important.
translation.es: Nuestra conexión no funciona. Es importante.

translation.en: [sighs] I don't know. Maybe ask upstairs.
[Buck] I can't skip hormones week to week.
-I'm counting on you, Steve. -[Steve] This is business.
[Steve] All right, don't waste my time. There's a ton of people who'll buy this shit if you don't.
translation.es: No me hagas perder el tiempo. Hay mucha gente que lo compraría.

translation.en: You want it or not?
[Buck] Give me the Demerol, instead.
What the fuck? Who said you could come into this house and film me?
translation.es: ¿Qué carajo? ¿Quién dijo que podías entrar y filmarme?

translation.en: -It's not on. I'm not recording. -No, like fuck it's not.
translation.es: - No está grabando. - Claro que sí.

translation.en: You're Prairie Johnson, aren't you?
I'm the OA.
What kind of a name is that?
[breathing heavily] I need Internet.
Will you give me your password,
or the password for one of the houses next door to me?
[scoffs] What's this look like to you, a Starbucks?
Not my problem. Get out.
-Give me a password and I'll go. -No, I don't owe you shit, bitch.
translation.es: - Dame una contraseña, y me iré. - No te debo nada, perra.

translation.en: Now leave or you're dog food.
translation.es: Vete o serás comida para perros.

translation.en: -Give me my camera. -This is my camera now.
translation.es: - Dame mi cámara. - Ahora es mía.

translation.en: Tax for your interruption.
Yo, I don't need news vans and cops all over this neighborhood.
translation.es: No necesito periodistas y policías por todo el barrio.

translation.en: I'm warning you.
-Attack! -[barking]
Stop, stop!
Don't you dare, Buck!
-[dog yelps] -What the fuck?
-Don't bite my dog! -[dog whimpering]
[shushing] You're good.
You're okay.
[Buck] Wait.
How did you get your sight?
[Steve] Come on, boy. Yo, Axel, come on.
Come on.
Crazy fuck.
You can't just disappear like that, Prairie. You scared us.
translation.es: No puedes desaparecer así, Prairie. Nos asustaste.

translation.en: Please don't call me that.
translation.es: Por favor, no me llames así.

translation.en: What am I supposed to do?
[stammers] Help me a little.
You-- You won't talk to the FBI...
translation.es: No quieres hablar con el FBI...

translation.en: but you... you won't talk to me either. I...
[stammers] I read about trauma online. I know that--
translation.es: Leí sobre el trauma en Internet. Sé que...

translation.en: It would help if you would let me go online.
translation.es: Me ayudaría que me dejaras usar Internet.

translation.en: To find Homer?
You watched my video?
Well, to try to help you.
-Are you hearing voices again? -I'm not hearing anything!
When you were a little girl first learning how to cane...
translation.es: Cuando eras pequeña y aprendías a usar el bastón...

translation.en: you got too confident too fast.
You decided to run.
You smacked into the edge of a wall and split your forehead open.
translation.es: Chocaste contra el filo de una pared y te abriste la frente.

translation.en: Do you remember that?
I... I know that you're not my flesh and blood...
translation.es: Sé que no eres mi propia sangre...

translation.en: but when that happened...
I knew that you were my daughter.
Because I felt it.
I felt like I got hit by that wall, too.
translation.es: También sentí que me golpeaba contra una pared.

translation.en: It's what I feel like now.
This is strange... for both of us.
translation.es: Esto es raro para las dos.

translation.en: -[stammering] You've got these-- -[gasps]
-[exhales] -But you're... you're not a stranger.
Mom, please.
It's not that I don't want to tell you. I want to...
translation.es: No es que no te quiera contar. Quiero...

translation.en: It's that it would hurt me to hurt you.
And it would hurt you.
Just give me some time.
translation.es: Solo dame un poco de tiempo.

translation.en: Watch it.
Come on. Hey. He's not worth it.
[choir singing] ♪ Come along ♪
♪ Swears she knew it Now she swears it's gone ♪
translation.es: Jura que lo sabía Ahora jura que lo olvidó

translation.en: ♪ She lies and says She's in love with him ♪
translation.es: Miente y dice Que está enamorada de él

translation.en: ♪ Can't find a better man ♪
translation.es: No puede encontrar un hombre mejor

translation.en: ♪ She dreams in color She dreams in red ♪
translation.es: Sueña a color Sueña con el rojo

translation.en: ♪ Can't find a better man ♪
translation.es: No puede encontrar un hombre mejor

translation.en: ♪ She lies and says She's in love with him ♪
translation.es: Miente y dice Que está enamorada de él

translation.en: [Steve] Yo, dude! Stop!
Man, I heard you singing in there.
Like... whoa!
Hey, you and your mom just moved into Crestwood, right? What's your name?
translation.es: Recién te mudaste a Crestwood, ¿no? ¿Cómo te llamas?

translation.en: -I gotta run. -Man, what are you gonna do with that?
You could be, like, famous.
I don't really want to talk to you.
What?
[sighs] You made fun of one of my friends for being gay,
translation.es: Te burlaste de uno de mis amigos por ser homosexual,

translation.en: and now you hear me sing and it's, like, all good?
translation.es: ahora me oyes cantar y, ¿está todo bien?

translation.en: -It's not like American Idol, like... -Uh-huh.
-Not in a mean way, but... -I get it. Relax, man.
translation.es: - No quiero ser cruel, pero... - Entiendo. Tranquilo.

translation.en: Hey, Miles?
[OA] I feel something forming.
translation.es: Siento que algo se está formando.

translation.en: Not a plan, but...
a feeling.
I met this boy and I think he has something to do with it.
translation.es: Conocí a un chico, y creo que tiene algo que ver.

translation.en: I keep trying to imagine you at his age.
Sixteen, seventeen.
[Steve] Please.
[chuckles] What you up to, crazy?
Looks weird in here.
I got a mobile router.
Just hook it up to your laptop, bam, it's connected, and paid for.
translation.es: Conéctalo a tu computadora, y estarás conectada sin pagar.

translation.en: -Oh, my God. -[chuckles] You want me to set it up?
translation.es: - Por Dios. - ¿Quieres que te lo instale?

translation.en: Yeah. [chuckles]
So, uh, I was thinking...
have you ever seen Strangers on a Train?
Basically, it's like, if people don't know you're connected...
translation.es: Si la gente no sabe que dos personas están relacionadas...

translation.en: then they can't figure out the crimes you do for each other.
translation.es: no pueden imaginar que cometen delitos uno por el otro.

translation.en: Thought I'd help you out and you could help me out.
translation.es: Pensé que yo puedo ayudarte, y tú puedes ayudarme.

translation.en: I do need help.
Good.
-You gonna plug that in? -Oh.
[chuckles] You're crazy.
All right.
Where's your mouse?
-You use this. -[typing]
-And then, right here... -All right, yeah.
-Enter. -I got it. I got it.
[automated voice] Launch Safari. Search YouTube.
-A-S-H-E-V. -[chuckles]
So, that's the trouble we need to get me out of.
translation.es: Ese es el problema del que necesito salir.

translation.en: [man] Move, move, move.
My dad wants to send me to Asheville to get, like... straightened out.
translation.es: Mi papá quiere enviarme a Asheville para que me enderecen.

translation.en: No one really goes there voluntarily, if you know what I mean.
translation.es: Nadie va voluntariamente, no sé si me entiendes.

translation.en: -[mother] Gentle. -[boy] Mom!
-[mother] Don't hurt him. I'm sorry. -[boy] Mom! Mama!
translation.es: - No lo lastimes. Lo siento. - ¡Mamá! RECUPERACIÓN DE ESTUDIANTE MILITAR

translation.en: [man] Keep it going, man. Go, go, go.
[mother] Don't hurt him, please.
-[boy] Mom! -[OA] I'll help you.
But I have conditions.
I need five people.
And I need them to be strong like you are, and flexible and brave.
translation.es: Que sean fuertes como tú, flexibles y valientes.

translation.en: And I need to use the abandoned house as a meeting place.
translation.es: Y necesito que nos reunamos en la casa abandonada.

translation.en: -Sure. Whatever you want. -And no touching.
translation.es: - Seguro. Lo que quieras. - Y sin tocarnos.

translation.en: I don't like to be touched.
translation.es: No me gusta que me toquen.

translation.en: [scoffs] No touching. No big deal.
You'll really do all that?
Well, Strangers on a Train. That's the idea.
translation.es: Pacto siniestro. Esa es la idea.

translation.en: But you gotta keep your end first.
translation.es: Pero primero, debes cumplir tu parte.

translation.en: Okay.
-So, what happened? -Nothing. Doesn't matter.
She said she likes some guy in chorus.
translation.es: Dijo que le gusta un tipo del coro.

translation.en: [scoffs] Come on.
Well, it's okay. You don't want to go there
translation.es: Está bien. No quieres hablar de eso

translation.en: until your invisible self is more developed anyway.
translation.es: hasta que tu "yo invisible" esté más desarrollado.

translation.en: What?
You know, your... longings, the desires you don't tell anyone about.
translation.es: Tus anhelos, los deseos que no le cuentas a nadie.

translation.en: [scoffs] I was just starting to think you were okay, but you blew it.
translation.es: Empezaba a pensar que estabas bien, pero lo arruinaste.

translation.en: You spend a lot of time on the visible you. It's impressive.
translation.es: Pasas mucho tiempo en tu "yo visible". Es impresionante.

translation.en: But she probably thinks the invisible you is missing.
translation.es: Debe pensar que el "yo invisible" no está.

translation.en: I have desires. I work hard.
I'm not gonna learn Chinese tomorrow and be, like, a CEO or some shit.
translation.es: No voy a aprender chino mañana y ser gerente.

translation.en: But I want stuff.
Like what?
[stammering] You know, to be somebody.
I have ambitions.
I'm gonna be a trainer to celebrities.
I'll have my own show, my own line of equipment.
translation.es: Tendré mi programa, mi línea de equipos.

translation.en: Me and Jesse have a YouTube channel already.
translation.es: Jesse y yo ya tenemos un canal de YouTube.

translation.en: That's stuff on the outside, though. What about the stuff on the inside?
translation.es: Todo eso es externo. ¿Qué hay de lo interno?

translation.en: Who the fuck asked you, crazy?
You're a grown-up who still lives at your parents' and tried to kill yourself.
translation.es: Eres una adulta que vive con sus padres e intentó suicidarse.

translation.en: [announcer] Attention, shoppers. Take advantage of our home sale.
translation.es: Atención, clientes. Aprovechen nuestra liquidación para el hogar.

translation.en: You can save 40-50% off...
[Steve] Let's just say this girl was worried about my invisible side...
translation.es: Digamos que a esta chica le preocupaba mi lado invisible...

translation.en: Which she's not, 'cause she just likes to fuck.
translation.es: No es así, porque solo le gusta coger...

translation.en: But say she was...
How do I, like, show her I got it?
Ugh! Yo, be gentle with that shit, OA.
Maybe try closing your eyes.
Just more often or...
Being blind was powerful. It made me listen.
translation.es: Ser ciega fue fuerte. Me hizo escuchar.

translation.en: [sighs] And it made people underestimate me.
translation.es: E hizo que la gente me subestimara.

translation.en: [mouths] Boring.
[OA] Yeah. It's boring... at first.
You gotta do a grown-up hairdo.
Oh, hey, don't I know you?
Yeah. [chuckles]
I'm a parent.
[Broderick-Allen] I'm sorry. I have a meeting.
Uh, I think I am your meeting.
I'm expecting Mr. Winchell. We've been speaking.
translation.es: Espero al Sr. Winchell. Hemos estado hablando.

translation.en: I'm, uh, Steve's stepmother.
Oh, of course.
Have a seat.
Well, I'm not calling this meeting to blame you or your husband.
translation.es: No pedí esta reunión para culparla a usted ni a su esposo.

translation.en: I'm calling this meeting to let you know that your son, your husband's son,
translation.es: La pedí para decirle que el hijo de su esposo...

translation.en: has become such a problem that I'm asking the school board
translation.es: se ha convertido en un problema tal que pediré a la junta escolar

translation.en: for his immediate expulsion.
Could you explain the problem?
I think it should be obvious from my probation letter, but if I must...
translation.es: Creo que es obvio en mi carta, pero si es necesario...

translation.en: I'm here to teach the kids that want to learn, the kids that have a desire to better themselves.
translation.es: Enseño a chicos que quieren aprender, chicos que desean mejorar.

translation.en: And if a disruptive, violent, and frankly, terrible student
translation.es: Si un estudiante terrible, perturbador y violento

translation.en: causes me problems, that's fine. I can handle that.
translation.es: me causa problemas, está bien. Puedo manejarlo.

translation.en: But when he costs the hardworking students their right to an education,
translation.es: Pero si limita el derecho a la educación de los estudiantes que se esfuerzan,

translation.en: that's when I say no more.
I think he has real psychological issues.
translation.es: Creo que tiene graves problemas psicológicos.

translation.en: Well, it's not really a measure of mental health to be well-adjusted
translation.es: No es una medida de salud mental estar bien adaptado

translation.en: -in a society that's very sick. -[chuckles lightly]
translation.es: en una sociedad que está muy enferma.

translation.en: That's a very clever bumper sticker, Mrs. Winchell,
translation.es: Esa es una frase muy inteligente, Sra. Winchell,

translation.en: but I'm going to remove your son from this school.
translation.es: pero sacaré a su hijo de esta escuela.

translation.en: [softly] Right.
What was your first reason?
I'm sorry?
Why did you become a teacher?
-This isn't about me. -But it is.
translation.es: - No se trata de mí. - Sí.

translation.en: It's about you and Steve, and the play, cast of two,
translation.es: Se trata de usted y Steve, y la obra, con un elenco de dos,

translation.en: setting, classroom, over many dimensions through time.
translation.es: ambientada en un aula, en muchas dimensiones a través del tiempo.

translation.en: I don't follow.
Maybe Steve can't learn because you lost track of your reason.
translation.es: Tal vez Steve no puede aprender porque usted olvidó su motivación.

translation.en: -Oh, God, this is ridiculous. -Betty...
Maybe I can help you remember.
translation.es: Tal vez pueda ayudarla a recordar.

translation.en: You lost someone. Someone important to you.
translation.es: Perdió a alguien. Alguien muy importante para usted.

translation.en: I lost someone important to me, too.
translation.es: Yo también perdí a alguien muy importante para mí.

translation.en: -Who'd you lose? -My patience if you don't stop.
translation.es: - ¿A quién perdió? - A mi paciencia, si no se detiene.

translation.en: Was it your first love? Or a parent?
Someone you loved young?
A sibling?
Look, you want to talk turkey?
Your sociopath of a son punched a kid in the throat.
translation.es: El sociópata de su hijo golpeó a un chico en la garganta.

translation.en: The victim didn't report it because he feared reprisal.
translation.es: La víctima no lo denunció porque temía una venganza.

translation.en: That boy has a lacerated trachea and is unable to sing at Nationals.
translation.es: Ese chico tiene la tráquea lacerada y no puede cantar en las Nacionales.

translation.en: So, I don't give a crap where the violence comes from and why.
translation.es: No me importa de dónde viene la violencia ni por qué.

translation.en: I don't want it in my school.
translation.es: No la quiero en mi escuela.

translation.en: No, you're right. Sorry, you're right.
You're right. This dimension is crumbling to violence and pettiness
translation.es: Tiene razón. Esta dimensión se desmorona por la violencia, la mezquindad

translation.en: and greed, and Steve is sensitive enough to feel it and he's angry.
translation.es: y la avaricia, y Steve es tan sensible que lo siente y se enoja.

translation.en: He's angry and he's lost.
And in order to find him, you'd have to teach yourself again,
translation.es: Para hallarlo, debe volver a enseñarse a sí misma,

translation.en: and you decided somewhere along the way that you were done learning.
translation.es: y, en algún momento, usted decidió no aprender más.

translation.en: It's... it's too painful to stay open.
Well, I think we all face the same hopelessness, Mrs. Winchell.
translation.es: Creo que todos enfrentamos la misma desesperanza.

translation.en: It's what we decide to do with it.
translation.es: Se trata de lo que decida hacer con eso.

translation.en: You're right. So what are you gonna do?
If you want to do your job, expel the bully.
translation.es: Si quiere hacer su trabajo, expulse al hostigador.

translation.en: Focus on the kid who sings like an angel even though he doesn't need you.
translation.es: Concéntrese en el chico que canta como un ángel, pero que no la necesita.

translation.en: If you want to be a teacher, teach Steve.
translation.es: Si quiere ser maestra, enséñele a Steve.

translation.en: He's the boy you can help become a man.
translation.es: Puede ayudar a ese chico a convertirse en un hombre.

translation.en: He's the one you lost.
He's your first reason.
I didn't catch your first name, Mrs. Winchell.
translation.es: No oí bien su nombre, Sra. Winchell.

translation.en: I'm the OA.
[Broderick-Allen] Okay, a show of hands...
A story of a shocking miracle emerged from Jefferson City today.
translation.es: Una historia de un asombroso milagro surgió hoy en Jefferson City.

translation.en: Last fall, Pershing College's star quarterback
translation.es: El pasado otoño, el mariscal de campo de Pershing College

translation.en: was expected to bring Missouri the championship title
translation.es: traería el título del campeonato a Misuri,

translation.en: until a near fatal accident on the field left him paralyzed and locked in a coma.
translation.es: hasta que un accidente fatal en el campo lo paralizó y dejó en coma.

translation.en: [man] He ain't movin'.
[news anchor] And as they held hands around their son's dying body,
translation.es: Y mientras se daban las manos alrededor de su hijo moribundo,

translation.en: a miracle happened. He woke up.
[reporter] You had what they call a near-death experience?
translation.es: ¿Tuviste una experiencia cercana a la muerte?

translation.en: Yeah, I flatlined, uh, after the accident, at the hospital.
translation.es: Sí, morí después del accidente en el hospital.

translation.en: [reporter] So, you know what it's like to die?
Yes, I... I guess I do. Um...
But I'm back now.
And I'm not... I'm not leaving the championship game
translation.es: HOMER ROBERTS HABLA DEL JUEGO TRÁGICO DEL AÑO PASADO Y no saldré de la final del campeonato en una camilla este año.

translation.en: on a stretcher this year.
translation.es: Y no saldré de la final del campeonato en una camilla este año.

translation.en: -[man] Atta boy. -I'm leaving with that ring.
[whispers] Homer...
Homer, where are you? [sobbing]
[Nancy] Prairie, there's an important phone call for you.
translation.es: Prairie, hay una llamada importante para ti.

translation.en: I can't talk right now.
I think you should. It's the FBI.
translation.es: Creo que deberías. Es del FBI.

translation.en: Hello?
[Steve exhales] That was like the Spanish Inquisition.
Um, would you mind if I talked on my own?
-Of course. -Thank you.
Thanks.
It was like Invaders of the Body Snatchers.
translation.es: Fue como La invasión de los ultracuerpos.

translation.en: Broderick-Allen is a different person.
Listen, I need five people, and I need them tonight.
translation.es: Necesito a cinco personas y las necesito esta noche.

translation.en: We have to get started because it's gonna take some time.
Whoa, whoa, whoa. Chill. What are you talking about?
Strangers on the Train. You owe me.
They need to be strong and they need to be flexible like you are.
translation.es: Deben ser fuertes y flexibles, como tú.

translation.en: -Why? What for? -I didn't ask you questions, did I?
translation.es: - ¿Por qué? ¿Para qué? - Yo no hice preguntas, ¿verdad?

translation.en: No, you were cool.
Midnight, at the abandoned house.
translation.es: A medianoche, en la casa abandonada.

translation.en: And everybody needs to leave their front door open. That's important.
translation.es: Es importante que todos dejen sus puertas abiertas.

translation.en: I always forget how crazy you are. Nobody is doing that.
translation.es: Siempre olvido cuán loca estás. Nadie hará eso.

translation.en: -That's how you get your shit stolen. -Steve...
translation.es: - Así es como te roban las cosas. - Steve...

translation.en: Look, I've got something going tonight, all right?
translation.es: Mira, tengo algo que hacer esta noche.

translation.en: And with the router, I... I think we're pretty even.
translation.es: Y con lo del router, creo que estamos a mano.

translation.en: Steve, you punched a kid in the throat.
translation.es: Steve, golpeaste a un chico en la garganta.

translation.en: You didn't tell me that.
Look, I'm at the end of a rope I should've fallen off of a long time ago.
translation.es: Estoy en el extremo de una cuerda de la que debería haber caído hace tiempo.

translation.en: And I need to help someone.
It's a long shot, but you're strong, that's why I chose you.
translation.es: Es poco probable, pero eres fuerte, por eso te elegí.

translation.en: I chose you, crazy.
You sure about that?
Midnight. Five people. You gave me your word.
translation.es: A medianoche. Cinco personas. Me diste tu palabra.

translation.en: All right.
Yeah, don't have a panic attack.
translation.es: No sufras un ataque de pánico.

translation.en: Um, Mr. Winchell?
-Yes, yes, Mrs... -Uh, Broderick-Allen.
Yes. Nice to see you.
Yeah, I wouldn't have stopped you,
I don't like to talk to parents unless it's in the classroom,
translation.es: no me gusta hablar con padres si no es en el aula,

translation.en: but I wanted to tell you, I think she's a unique woman.
translation.es: pero quería decirle que es una mujer única.

translation.en: And I think she's gonna turn Steve's life around.
translation.es: Creo que cambiará la vida de Steve.

translation.en: And I want you to know I'm committed to help.
translation.es: Y quiero que sepa que me comprometo a ayudar.

translation.en: That girl, his girlfriend?
No, no. Uh, your, your new wife.
-His what? -The new Mrs. Winchell.
-I'm Mrs. Winchell. -[chuckles softly]
[Mrs. Winchell] Nancy, Abel, it's the Winchells.
Now's not the best time. Prairie's taking a nap.
translation.es: No es buen momento. Prairie está durmiendo.

translation.en: Oh, I bet she is. Uh...
-We need to talk, Nancy. -Oh, come in.
[Mrs. Winchell] Children should not be exposed to someone capable of identity theft.
translation.es: Los chicos no deberían estar expuestos a alguien capaz de robar una identidad.

translation.en: [Nancy] Prairie suffered a very traumatic experience--
translation.es: Prairie sufrió una experiencia muy traumática...

translation.en: [Mr. Winchell] And we've been with you every step of the way.
translation.es: Y los hemos acompañado a cada paso.

translation.en: But if she's coercing our kids...
translation.es: Pero si ella está obligando a nuestros hijos...

translation.en: Your son is 17, not seven.
translation.es: Tu hijo tiene 17 años, no siete.

translation.en: And it was his parent-teachers' conference.
translation.es: Y era la reunión de sus padres con su maestra.

translation.en: [Mr. Winchell] Steve?
I already told you at home.
translation.es: Ya se los dije en casa.

translation.en: [Mr. Winchell] Tell us again.
She wanted Internet.
And she just came up with the idea.
translation.es: Y se le ocurrió la idea.

translation.en: Said it was a fair trade for a router. It's no big deal.
translation.es: Que era un cambio justo por un router. Nada importante.

translation.en: She was looking for someone named Homer.
-[scoffs] -[Abel] We've been neighbors for years. You were here for Prairie's homecoming.
translation.es: Hace años que somos vecinos. Vinieron a darle la bienvenida a Prairie.

translation.en: Makes no sense your coming over here slinging accusations.
translation.es: No tiene sentido que vengan a acusarla.

translation.en: [Mr. Winchell] And we have nothing but admiration for you and Nancy...
translation.es: Sentimos admiración por ti y por Nancy.

translation.en: I need help.
What she's doing is disturbing.
She's a grown woman pursuing a boy.
translation.es: Es una mujer adulta que persigue a un chico.

translation.en: She is not thinking like an adult.
translation.es: Ella no piensa como un adulto.

translation.en: You're in denial, Nancy.
What if this becomes sexual?
translation.es: ¿Y si se convierte en algo sexual?

translation.en: -That's a crime. -Are you kidding me?
First, I have a girlfriend.
And second, this is about just... just friends.
She doesn't have any friends and I'm being a friend. That's it.
translation.es: No tiene ninguno, y yo trato de serlo. Eso es todo.

translation.en: All this sick weird shit's coming from your brains.
translation.es: Toda esta mierda enferma sale de sus cabezas.

translation.en: -[Mr. Winchell] Jesus, Steven-- -She impersonated me.
translation.es: - Por Dios, Steven... - Se hizo pasar por mí.

translation.en: Because I asked her to.
'Cause I wanted someone on my fucking side for once. And guess what?
translation.es: Quería que alguien estuviera de mi lado por una vez. ¿Y saben qué?

translation.en: It actually helped.
Come on, come on, come on, come on, come on, come on, come on.
You did say, Abel, the doctors in St. Louis
translation.es: Tú lo dijiste, Abel, los médicos de San Luis

translation.en: recommended that she be committed.
You... you talked about that?
[Abel] They were wrong.
But if the doctors are saying she needs serious help--
translation.es: Pero si los médicos dicen que necesita ayuda en serio...

translation.en: She needs to be home... with us.
translation.es: Necesita estar en casa con nosotros.

translation.en: And not to be attacked by people who lack compassion and... and understanding.
translation.es: Y no que la ataque gente sin compasión ni comprensión.

translation.en: Oh, we understand what it's like to struggle with a child.
translation.es: Entendemos lo que es luchar con un hijo.

translation.en: We're sending Steve away to get the help he needs.
translation.es: Enviaremos a Steve a que reciba la ayuda que necesita.

translation.en: Until then, keep her away from him.
Please don't take the camera.
translation.es: Por favor, no se lleven la cámara.

translation.en: Prairie, I know it's hard, but it's for the best.
translation.es: Prairie, sabemos que es duro, pero es lo mejor.

translation.en: We-- We should have followed the hospital guidelines from the beginning to keep you safe.
translation.es: Deberíamos haber seguido los lineamientos para cuidarte desde el principio.

translation.en: What am I supposed to do? ID parents?
translation.es: ¿Qué se supone que haga? ¿Pedir identificación a los padres?

translation.en: She's disturbed.
Do you know how I know? Those eyes.
translation.es: ¿Sabes cómo lo sé? Por los ojos.

translation.en: Besides that, she lies.
Oh. Okay, sure. Yeah, see you tomorrow.
[OA] I need help.
I need to--
[OA] I need help.
I need to cross a border that's hard to define.
translation.es: Necesito cruzar un límite difícil de definir.

translation.en: Maybe you know what I'm talking about?
Or you don't, but... you feel it.
Because you've felt other borders, like youth and adulthood, maybe.
translation.es: Porque tal vez has sentido otros límites, como la adolescencia o la adultez.

translation.en: I can't change your fate... but I can help you meet it.
translation.es: No puedo cambiar tu destino, pero puedo ayudarte a encontrarlo.

translation.en: We begin our journey to the border tonight. Midnight.
translation.es: Empezamos nuestro viaje al límite esta noche. A medianoche.

translation.en: The unfinished house at the edge of Crestwood View.
translation.es: La casa sin terminar en el límite de Crestwood View.

translation.en: Don't come unless you leave your front door open.
translation.es: No vengas si no dejas tu puerta abierta.

translation.en: You have to invite me in.
Michelle, you hungry?
You want me to warm up the spaghetti?
No, I'm just grabbing my textbook from downstairs. I'm fine.
translation.es: No, solo busco mi libro abajo. Estoy bien.

translation.en: [Mr. Vu] Okay.
[automated voice] 12:20 AM.
[Steve chuckles] Hey, you wanna drink a 40?
[Jaye] Hey, deadbeat.
Hey yourself.
-Heard you punched Miles Brekov. -From who?
translation.es: - Oí que golpeaste a Miles Brekov. - ¿Quién te lo dijo?

translation.en: Did you do that because of me?
[chuckles] You really think the world revolves around you, don't you?
translation.es: De verdad crees que el mundo gira a tu alrededor, ¿no?

translation.en: Hey, I'm not the one drinking alone with my dog.
translation.es: No soy yo quien bebe sola con su perro.

translation.en: Oh, please tell me, Jaye, what should I be doing, huh?
translation.es: Por favor, dime, Jaye, ¿qué debería estar haciendo?

translation.en: Whoever you did it for, it's gonna get you kicked out of school.
-[scoffs] -Was that the plan all along? Self-destruct?
You really like to kick a guy when he's down.
translation.es: Te gusta hacer leña del árbol caído.

translation.en: Come on, get in.
Chris is having a thing.
Oh, come on, buddy.
Why didn't you want to be my girlfriend?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no querías ser mi novia?

translation.en: You're drunk. Oh, come on. Look, I'm leaving anyway.
translation.es: - Estás borracho. - Vamos. Me iré de todos modos.

translation.en: You said you like how I smell.
translation.es: Dijiste que te gusta mi olor.

translation.en: I wanna get good at sex.
translation.es: Quiero ser buena en el sexo.

translation.en: -[scoffs] -This has been practice.
One day I will fall in love,
and when that happens, I'll be ready.
translation.es: y, cuando suceda, quiero estar lista.

translation.en: -That's messed up. -You're an asshole.
translation.es: - Eso es perturbador. - Eres un idiota.

translation.en: I see you looking at yourself when we're having sex.
translation.es: Te miras cuando estamos teniendo sexo.

translation.en: This isn't just about me for you, either.
translation.es: Para ti, tampoco se trata de mí.

translation.en: What?
Fucking invisible self.
How many of those have you had?
Look, I'll spend the night tonight, okay?
translation.es: Mira, me quedaré toda la noche, ¿sí?

translation.en: If you don't want to be alone?
Yo, this is my house. Pull over.
You're right. I am an asshole.
Yo, keep the 40!
Bye!
Hey, don't turn the lights out on us, crazy.
translation.es: No nos apagues las luces, loca.

translation.en: [Steve] Look, my parents flipped.
I'm getting Asheville. It could be tonight, it could be next week.
translation.es: Iré a Asheville. Esta noche o la semana que viene.

translation.en: -I'm here anyway, right? -[OA] Right.
But I can't.
Oh, come on, OA. Don't hold a grudge.
I need at least five. I told you.
translation.es: Necesito al menos cinco. Te lo dije.

translation.en: -We are five. -[OA] Not including me.
Look, just include yourself and let's get going already.
Okay, what exactly is it that we're doing here?
I need to... go somewhere, and I think that you can help me get there.
translation.es: Necesito ir a un lugar, y creo que pueden ayudarme a llegar.

translation.en: But I'll need to leave something important behind,
-and it only works if there are five. -[scoffs]
translation.es: y solo funciona si hay cinco.

translation.en: Yo, I'm tired of all this shit, OA. I'm...
translation.es: Estoy cansado de esta mierda, OA.

translation.en: I left my door open.
[OA] I'm gonna tell you my story from the beginning.
translation.es: Les contaré mi historia desde el principio.

translation.en: And there will come a point when you'll see why you're here...
translation.es: Llegará un momento en que entenderán por qué están aquí...

translation.en: what you might do together,
how you could help people that you'll never meet.
translation.es: cómo pueden ayudar a gente que nunca conocerán.

translation.en: But you have to pretend to trust me until you actually do.
translation.es: Pero deben fingir que confían en mí hasta que confíen de verdad.

translation.en: I want you to close your eyes.
I want you to imagine everything I tell you
translation.es: Imaginen todo lo que les digo

translation.en: as if you're there yourself.
As if you're with me.
As if you are me.
Close them.
I imagine with my eyes open.
[OA] Okay.
Could you close them for me then?
I was born in Russia, in 1987.
[scoffs] What?
Come on.
My father was a very wealthy man.
translation.es: Mi padre era un hombre muy rico.

translation.en: He ran a mining company. He took precious metals out of the ground.
translation.es: Dirigía una empresa minera. Extraía metales preciosos de la tierra.

translation.en: We were always being watched,
because he'd made so much money so quickly.
translation.es: porque había ganado mucho dinero muy rápidamente.

translation.en: And at that time, if you had that kind of money,
translation.es: En esa época, si tenías tanto dinero,

translation.en: you paid some of it to the Voi.
We lived in a secret enclave just outside Moscow
translation.es: Vivíamos en un enclave secreto en las afueras de Moscú

translation.en: with many of the other recent rich.
translation.es: con varios de los demás nuevos ricos.

translation.en: And the snow was seven feet high,
translation.es: Había más de dos metros de nieve,

translation.en: but you could still make out many big houses
translation.es: pero igual se divisaban muchas casas grandes

translation.en: behind big gates lost in the white.
translation.es: detrás de grandes rejas perdidas en lo blanco.

translation.en: You asked me how I got my sight.
translation.es: Me preguntaste cómo recuperé la vista.

translation.en: The better story is how I lost it in the first place.
translation.es: Cómo la perdí es una historia mejor.

translation.en: I was not born blind.
I remember the bright colored domes of Saint Basil's Cathedral,
translation.es: Recuerdo los colores de las cúpulas de la catedral de San Basilio,

translation.en: the gray waters of the Moskva River.
translation.es: las aguas grises del río Moscova.

translation.en: Our town was built on the fall.
translation.es: La ciudad se construyó en la caída de la Unión Soviética.

translation.en: Each house was a new fortune.
translation.es: Cada casa era una nueva fortuna.

translation.en: There was the man who drilled oil, the man who dug coal, the man who made cable.
translation.es: Estaba el que extraía carbón, el que hacía cables, el que extraía petróleo.

translation.en: I grew up with the sons and daughters of these oligarchs.
translation.es: Crecí con los hijos de esos oligarcas.

translation.en: My mother died in childbirth.
translation.es: Mi madre murió en el parto.

translation.en: It was just my father and I in a big, lonely house.
translation.es: Solo estábamos mi padre y yo en una casa grande y solitaria.

translation.en: I suffered from things then.
Dreams.
They had smells in them and sounds that were sharper than life.
In one of them, I'm trapped in an aquarium,
translation.es: En uno, estaba atrapada en un acuario,

translation.en: -and I can't breathe, I can't get out. -[child shouts] Nina!
Papa.
Papa!
Papa!
Nina. [speaking Russian]
Papa!
-[shushing] -It came again. The same again.
I'm underwater and I see the floating crayons and I can't breathe.
translation.es: Estoy bajo el agua, veo crayones que flotan y no puedo respirar.

translation.en: [shushing] It's just a dream, my little cabbage.
translation.es: Estoy bajo el agua, veo crayones que flotan y no puedo respirar. Es solo un sueño, querida.

translation.en: A fantasy.
No. I felt it just like I feel you pinching my nose.
translation.es: No. Lo sentí como siento que me tocas la nariz.

translation.en: Cancel this afternoon. Move everything to this evening.
translation.es: Cancela esta tarde. Pasa todo para la noche.

translation.en: We are going to get rid of this nightmare.
[Azarov] Stop here.
Keep the car warm.
Come on, cabbage.
[in Russian] Papa, it's too cold. I can't.
translation.es: Papá, hace mucho frío. No puedo.

translation.en: What's the only way to fight cold?
translation.es: ¿Cuál es la única forma de combatir el frío?

translation.en: Become colder than it is.
[OA in English] My father taught me about bravery that day.
translation.es: Ese día, mi padre me enseñó sobre el valor.

translation.en: That night, it was so cold, one of our horses froze to death.
translation.es: Esa noche hizo tanto frío que uno de los caballos murió congelado.

translation.en: But the dreams of the aquarium never came back.
translation.es: Pero los sueños del acuario nunca volvieron.

translation.en: Months passed. My nose didn't bleed once.
translation.es: Pasaron meses. No me volvió a sangrar la nariz.

translation.en: I had started school now.
All the kids in the neighborhood were picked up on a special bus.
translation.es: Un autobús especial recogía a los chicos del barrio.

translation.en: I was always first.
I felt something in the pit of my stomach...
translation.es: Sentí algo en la boca del estómago...

translation.en: like the eggs were sitting there stuck, unbroken.
translation.es: como si los huevos estuvieran atorados, sin romper.

translation.en: I felt like I wanted to get off that bus.
translation.es: Sentí que quería bajarme del autobús.

translation.en: [in Russian] Yeah, but I didn't like it. It made you think too much about death.
translation.es: Sí, pero no me gustó. Te hizo pensar mucho en la muerte.

translation.en: [boy] Like when the boy shoots himself.
translation.es: Como cuando el chico se pega un tiro.

translation.en: [girl] Yeah, like one day you are here, and then suddenly you aren't here.
translation.es: Sí, como si un día estás aquí y luego ya no estás más.

translation.en: You aren't anywhere.
Did you see it, Ninny?
I think you are always somewhere.
translation.es: Creo que siempre estás en algún lado.

translation.en: What's wrong with your nose?
Oh, it's nothing.
[gasps] There is a light beneath us.
translation.es: Hay una luz debajo de nosotros.

translation.en: Maybe one of the windows is broken.
If we swim deep, maybe we could make it out.
translation.es: Si nadamos profundo, tal vez podamos salir.

translation.en: [girl] Nina! Nina!
[OA in English] We were a message, see?
From the Voi to our parents.
And the message said, "You are powerful businessmen to be sure,
translation.es: El mensaje era: "Seguro que son empresarios poderosos,

translation.en: but you are not all-powerful."
The youngest sons and daughters of every Russian scion was on that bus that day.
translation.es: Los hijos menores de cada heredero ruso estaba en el autobús ese día.

translation.en: They all died. Every single one of them.
translation.es: Todos murieron. Cada uno de ellos.

translation.en: Including me.
I couldn't tell if I was inside the earth or above it.
translation.es: No sabía si estaba adentro de la tierra o arriba.

translation.en: Why was the dark so dazzling?
[Khatun whispering] Nina.
[in Arabic] Do you want to go back?
You will know great love...
but it will be very hard.
You will suffer.
Me?
I want you to stay here.
[in Russian] Back.
[in Arabic] Then...
I will take your eyes.
Because I cannot bear for you to see what lies ahead.
translation.es: Porque no tolero que veas lo que te espera.

translation.en: It's too horrible.
[coughing] Papa.
[OA in English] I could feel his cheek against mine. It was cold.
translation.es: Sentía su mejilla contra la mía. Estaba fría.

translation.en: And I could hear his breath.
And though my eyes were wide open...
translation.es: Y aunque tenía los ojos abiertos...

translation.en: it was black.
I said, "Papa..."
[in Russian] I can't see.
[in English] "I can't see anything at all."
